Claim: "Elephants won't make it to see a warmer climate."
Implication: "Habitat loss and human predation are a far greater problem for most animals."
Referring expressions: Elephants, warmer climate  Habitat loss, human predation, most animals.
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsWarm(b) and ~WillNotReach(a)))) -> (exists e (exists c (exists d (IsHabitatLoss(c) and (IsHumanPredation(d) or IsMostAnimals(e))))))
